testing_tools: Burp Suite, OWASP ZAP, Manual Code Review
test_scenarios: ["JWT manipulation","Session hijacking","Authentication bypass","MFA bypass","Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) on profile/connection endpoints"]
acceptance_criteria: Zero critical or high vulnerabilities. All authorization logic must be enforced server-side.
reporting_requirements: Detailed vulnerability report with PoC; Remediation tracking in Jira.

test_scenarios: ["Detection of vulnerable dependencies","Identification of insecure coding patterns (e.g., SQLi)","Scanning of Docker images for known OS/library vulnerabilities"]
acceptance_criteria: Zero new critical or high vulnerabilities introduced.
remediation_sla: Must be fixed before PR merge.
reporting_requirements: Automated feedback within GitHub Pull Request.
trend_analysis: Track number of new vulnerabilities introduced per sprint.

test_scenarios: ["Verify permanent account deletion removes all PII from all data stores (Postgres, OpenSearch, S3)","Verify data export feature provides all user data in a machine-readable format","Verify disaster recovery process correctly re-applies deletions"]
acceptance_criteria: Full compliance with documented GDPR/CCPA requirements.
